Features.Feature: Add/Edit/Delete Timers
Manual Time Adjustment
Search For Jira Within Gallifrey
Export With Comments And Adjust Remaining Estimates
Notify When No Timers Are Running
Auto Assign And Set In Progress Status
Bulk Exporting
Auto Updating
Time Tracking When Machine Is Locked
Many Theme Combinations For Light/Dark and Colours
Targets For How Much Time You Should Export
Export Reminder Prompts
Auto Comment Prefix And Default Comment
Background Sync With Jira
Automatic Clean-Up
Multiple Select Operations On Timers (Delete/Edit/Export)
Keyboard Shortcuts
Context Menu On Timers

Bugs.Bug: Change the way the SOAP client is created to fix connection issue
Fix bug with locked timers adding with search

Features.Feature: When adding locked timers, prompts if you want to add to running timer
Added link to Gitter for chat help
Added Copy/Paste functionality to timers to get jira ref and add new timer with same ref
Updated some keyboard shortcuts
Show all dates even if no timers for that date
Added temporary timers for logging purpose when you don't have a Jira reference to hand
Ability to add lock time to an existing timer or recent reference
Added bulk export when clicking unexported time notice or multi selecting timers
Ability to add export comments as a standard comment as well as worklog comment

Bugs.Bug: Fix issue for exported timers resetting to un-exported
Round locked timers to nearest minute as seconds are not logged anyway
Updated the order of default search results
Fixed issue with getting an idle timer after it's auto purged
Fixed issue with changing timer date when running recreating a copy of the original timer
Auto update check now doesn't run when a flyout is open
Keyboard shortcuts only active when flyout not open
Hide version number and window controls when flyout open
Attempting to fix memory leak when running Gallifrey for long periods
Fixed error when search loaded

Features.Feature: Adding "Premium" switch for a Premium set of features
Time adjustment now increments/decrements hours when minutes full/empty
Update the set in progress to update status so you can update the status at all stages
Removed auto re-open/close on export as this has strange behaviour

Bugs.Bug: Fix issue with locked timer when adding to new timer
Fix issue following an empty search locking the search flyout
Fix issue when time entry is blank showing error message

Features.Feature: If bulk export fails, you are now given chance to retry or cancel

Bugs.Bug: Fix issue when minutes over 99 entered by accident increments hours
Fix spelling errors
Fix the installationID not being generated on new installs

Features.Feature: Added ability to cancel issue search when adding timer
Added a timeout on all non-cancellable progress dialogs
Prevent a non auto updateable version of Gallifrey from starting
Added search button to the edit timer to replicate functionality of add timer
Ability to add timers for a period as well as single day
Clicking on the no timer running notice now creates a timer for that number of minutes
Right click context on timer area now has Add timer to fill export target feature
Allow search on term and filter whereby issues need to be in BOTH to show
Added "Tracking Only" mode to hide all export functionality - Use if you need to manually export to another timesheet tool

Bugs.Bug: Fix issue with GALLIFREY-TEMP showing when converting a temp timer to a normal Jira timer
Fix issue with error editing temp timers
Fix issue whereby filter JQL order by is ignored in return
Update wording in settings for "Idle" becoming "Locked"
Activity check now updates every minute rather than every alert time (e.g. 5) minutes
Fixing context menu being displayed when right clicking a timer
Fixing search to be more specific on text searches
Fix issue with jira credentials not checked on saving settings

Others.Other: Temp timers are now "Local" timers in preparation for exporting to a destination other than Jira

Bugs.Bug: Fix the context menu

Features.Feature: Added config to turn lock/idle timers on/off
Added configurable threshold fo lock/idle time
Warn when adding for period on a non-working day and offer to skip
Add Ability to change status on export
Added default timers to be created on empty working days
Added config to force top-most window when a flyout opens
Added progress dialogs for all Jira interaction to deal with a slow instance

Bugs.Bug: Update to context menu to only show timer menu when right click on a timer
Fix slow startup from refreshing project cache
Fix timer adjustment buttons ignoring maximum time value on edit
Separate local time from Jira timers in unexported time summary

Others.Other: Attempt to fix slow memory leak

Bugs.Bug: Fix for re-showing old bulk export due to hidden flyout not closing properly

Features.Feature: Allow local timers to be purged when old along with exported timers
Improved Premium access security

Standardise the title bar font/casing

Correct back colour on flyouts

Add new user setup flow

If Tempo api is found, us it for timesheet information
